document_data.name: The Power
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Power''''' was a ballad written sometime before the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. {{quote|''Rocky though the road might be, blinding be the sun,''
''Raise your swords and grab your wands - the battle will be won.''
''Champions, cry into the wind!''
''Warriors, stomp upon the ground!''
''You are the victors true. You are The Power!''|Excerpt from ''The Power''}}
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the sheet music and lyrics of ''The Power'' could be found in the [[Chromatic Scale]] musical instrument shop in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]].
